FT_TS04_TC01-to-FT_TS04_TC08.description: data marker FT_TS04_TC01_time - FT_TS04_TC02_timeFormat - FT_TS04_TC03_type = flag - FT_TS04_TC04_identifier not specified should show blank marker - FT_TS04_TC05_identifier when specified should display the character - FT_TS04_TC07_value - FT_TS04_TC08_without specifying series

FT_TS04_TC12.description: Data markers should not appear for null data.

FT_TS04_TC13.description: Data markers should appear when zoomed to Minute level

FT_TS04_TC17_18.description: data marker with no type, flag + flag, pin + pin, flag + pin

FTV3-981_FT_TS04_TC12.description: Pin Data markers should not appear for null data.

FT_TS08_TC01.description: navigator.enabled = false should hide the navigator

FT_TS08_TC02_FT_TS08_TC11.description: navigator is shown by default. Min height of selection- 48px.Max height of selection- 60px. Scroller static height - 17px

FT_TS08_TC02_FT_TS08_TC03_FT_TS08_TC09.description: FT_TS08_TC02_time navigator should be shown by default - FT_TS08_TC02_all series should be represented in Time Navigator when series is specified - FT_TS08_TC09_For multi-series or stacked column plots in canvas, it will be represented as stacked area in time navigator.

FT_TS08_TC04__FT_TS08_TC05.description: FT_TS08_TC04_all series should be represented in Time Navigator when series is not specified - FT_TS08_TC05_color of plots in Time Navigator should match the actual plots

FT_TS08_TC08.description: Line plots will be drawn in TN for single series column and line plots

FT_TS08_TC10.description: candlestick will be represented as line against the close value in time navigator
